CustomField.description: A field for indicating the type of Maintenance Work Rule this MWR Template will generate. Type can be Calendar-Based for Recurrence Pattern, or Criteria-Based for Recordset Filter Criteria.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A field for indicating the type of Maintenance Work Rule this MWR Template will generate. Type can be Calendar-Based for Recurrence Pattern, or Criteria-Based for Recordset Filter Criteria.
CustomField.label: Maintenance Work Rule Type
